response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence in mind. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to quality and functionality. Given its exceptional features and the time, effort, and resources invested into its creation, I believe it's worth more than $80 to you. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 120}
